the.nss.boys.blog.service

Class TopicService

  • java.lang.Object
    • the.nss.boys.blog.service.TopicService

  • @Service
 @CacheConfig(cacheNames="topics")
public class TopicService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service for Topics Adds, Removes, Find and Update topics then persist to database via TopicDao
